# value

**Instance Property**

The current value belonging to this interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
var value: TabletopInteraction.Value { get }
```

## Getting the value of the interaction

- **TabletopInteraction.Value**: A structure that provides the details about an interaction, such as the phase of the gesture and position of the equipment.
